title: LIVE with a smile!
description: LIVE with a smile! is a song sung by Aqours, Nijigasaki High School Idol Club and Liella!, and is also the theme song for the LoveLive! Series Presents COUNTDOWN LoveLive! 2021→2022 〜LIVE with a smile!〜 concert. It was released on November 3, 2021.

infobox.Artist: Aqours, Nijigasaki High School Idol Club & Liella!
infobox.Label: Lantis
infobox.Image: LIVE with a smile! CD jacket art.jpg
